description: The hidden village of the Shandia people who were blasted into the sky 400 years ago along with half of Jaya. The warriors live here and plan their rebellion against whoever claims to be God of Skypiea.

keyEvents.title: Kamakiri Observes Aisa
keyEvents.description: Kamakiri is shown observing Aisa sneaking back into the Shandia village after gathering Vearth.
keyEvents.significance: First glimpse of the Shandia village and their daily life.

keyEvents.title: Shandian Warriors Council
keyEvents.description: The Shandian warriors including Wyper, Kamakiri, Raki, Braham, and Genbo hold a council meeting to discuss their strategy regarding Gan Fall's appearance at Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the village as the strategic headquarters for the Shandian rebellion.

statusHistory.reason: Village is operational and serves as base for Shandian warriors
